0.name: Augusta
0.description: Philip Huff Jones' Winfield, named for his wife. Finch tried to present it to her as a gift, but as she would not accept the tribute, it unceremoniously entered the arsenal of his men.

1.name: Bayou Phoenix
1.description: Ornamented with every shade found within the heart of a blazing fire, this Winfield M1873C Marksman is said to always find itys way back into the bayou, ready to rise to any occasion.
